title: Feeling of passing wind during salah, is it whispers of Satan #Assim #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: so sh I have this problem uh whenever I stand up to pray the Salah I feel like that I'm passing wind uh and I hear small sounds but when I am not praying this there's no sound so I'm not sure whether these are Whispers of Shan or I have a problem are you sure that this is passing wind or you're still doubtful uh I'm not uh 100% sure I'm ignore it ignore it and continue to pray
